localize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to find out exactly where something is
localize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A mechanic is trying to localize the fault.
localize.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to limit the effect that something has, or the size of area it covers
localize.translation[0].definitions[1].e: They hoped to localize the fighting.
localize.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to organize a business or industry so that things happen at a local level rather than a national one
localize.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The company is continuing with its efforts to localize production.
localize.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to make changes in advertising etc to make it more suitable for a particular place
localize.translation[1].definitions[1].e: the free weeklies in Los Angeles that localize news and advertising
